Github

App

The mobile applications the user will use is based on Ionic2. Check out the source code for more details. Currently Chart.js is being used for the visualizations.

  sudo npm install -g ionic
  cd app
  ionic serve
  • GitHub

Designed and built with all the love in the world by @haagsemakers and @borderlabs. Maintained by the core team with the help of our contributors.

Currently v0.1. Code licensed MIT, docs CC BY 3.0.
